name: Synaptiq
headline: Synaptiq ð§  AI-Powered Training for Doctors
description: Synaptiq's mission is to become the AI infrastructure for the $110B medical education industry, leading to better physicians, a more efficient healthcare system, and improved patient care.

founders.name: Ryan Phelps, Founder
founders.description: Ryan Phelps, MD is a co-founder and the CEO of Synaptiq. Previously, he was a neurosurgery resident at Stanford, and a medical student at UCSF.

founders.name: Kevin Bastoul, Founder
founders.description: Co-Founder & CTO @ Synaptiq. Previously software engineer at Block and Veeva Systems.

founders.name: Jacob Caccamo, Founder
founders.description:
Co-Founder, COO, & Head of Design @ Synaptiq

Specialize in Interaction Design, User Research, Human Factors Methodology, and Front-End Development. 6+ years of experience designing products in the Private and Public sectors.

# The AI-Powered Learning Platform for Medicine
Study less. Remember more. Education that adapts to you.
[Get Started](https://synaptiq.co/<https:/www.synaptiq.app/users/sign_up>)
[![Get it on Google Play](https://synaptiq.co/assets/Download_on_the_App_Store_Badge_US-UK_RGB_blk_092917.svg)](https://synaptiq.co/<https:/apps.apple.com/us/app/synaptiq/id6463165449>) [![Get it on Google Play](https://play.google.com/intl/en_us/badges/static/images/badges/en_badge_web_generic.png)](https://synaptiq.co/<https:/play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=app.synaptiq.mobile&hl=en_US&gl=US&utm_source=marketingSite&pcampaignid=pcampaignidMKT-Other-global-all-co-prtnr-py-PartBadge-Mar2515-1>)
![](https://synaptiq.co/assets/index/wave.svg) ![](https://synaptiq.co/assets/index/wave.svg)
## Designed for Learning Medicine
## Cutting-Edge Algorithms
Put your personalized review schedule on autopilot with evidence-backed spaced repetition algorithms optimized for medical education.

generated_description:
**Synaptiq Overview**

Founded in 2022 and based in San Francisco, Synaptiq is a dynamic startup that's carving a niche for itself in the bustling medical education landscape. As part of Y Combinator's Batch S23, this small team of three is ambitiously aiming to become the AI backbone of the staggering $110 billion medical education industry. Their mission? To enhance physician training, making healthcare more efficient and ultimately improving patient care.

**What They Do**

Synaptiq has developed an AI-powered learning platform specifically designed for medical education. The premise is straightforward yet powerful: "Study less. Remember more." They utilize evidence-backed spaced repetition algorithms to create personalized study schedules that adapt to the user's learning pace. With features like yield toggling for information detail, personal progress tracking, and a collaborative deck-sharing option, Synaptiq powers up the learning experience for future doctors.

Whether you're a night owl who thrives in dark mode or someone who prefers collaborating with peers, Synaptiq provides tools tailored to different learning preferences. Their platform not only enhances individual study habits but also fosters community learning among medical professionals.

**Company Attributes**

- **Website**: [synaptiq.co](https://synaptiq.co/)
- **Location**: San Francisco, CA
- **Tagline**: “AI-Powered Training for Doctors”
- **Key Focus Areas**: Artificial Intelligence, Education, Healthcare
- **Group Partner**: Nan

**Why It Matters**

Synaptiq is more than just a tech company; it represents a significant leap forward in how we educate medical professionals. By marrying AI with medical training, they are looking to produce better physicians who can ultimately enhance patient care and transform the healthcare system. If you’re keen on innovations that impact real-world lives, keep an eye on Synaptiq. They're not just studying medicine; they're revolutionizing it.
